quotes.message: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are.
quotes.name: Donald Miller

quotes.message: The quality of our expectations determines the quality of our action.
quotes.name: A. Godin

quotes.message: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quotes.name: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.message: Peace begins When expectation ends.
quotes.name: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.message: So the secret to good self-esteem is to lower your expectations to the point where they're already met?
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: A life that is burdened with expectations is a heavy life. Its fruit is sorrow and disappointment.
quotes.name: Douglas Adams

quotes.message: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Alexander Pope

quotes.message: Expect everything so that nothing comes unexpected.
quotes.name: Norton Juster

quotes.message: Unhappiness lies in that gap between our talents and our expectations.
quotes.name: Sebastian Horsley

quotes.message: I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: You can't expect everyone to have the same dedication as you.
quotes.name: Jeff Kinney

quotes.message: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: That was the thing about the world: it wasn't that things were harder than you thought they were going to be, it was that they were hard in ways that you didn't expect.
quotes.name: Lev Grossman

quotes.message: You don't ask nobody to give what they can't give, or be what they can't be. You've learnt that, you got a headstart on heartbreak.
quotes.name: Jack Farris

quotes.message: Expectation is the mother of all frustration.
quotes.name: Antonio Banderas

quotes.message: We must rediscover the distinction between hope and expectation.
quotes.name: Ivan Illich

quotes.message: Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
quotes.name: Princess Diana

quotes.message: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.name: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.message: We love to expect, and when expectation is either disappointed or gratified, we want to be again expecting.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: If you do not the expect the unexpected you will not find it, for it is not to be reached by search or trail.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: We find what we expect to find, and we receive what we ask for.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Good is not good, when better is expected.
quotes.name: Thomas Fuller

quotes.message: It's a funny thing about life: if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
quotes.name: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.message: Anger always comes from frustrated expectations
quotes.name: Elliott Larson

quotes.message: We must learn to reawaken and keep ourselves awake, not by mechanical aid, but by an infinite expectation of the dawn.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The best things in life are unexpected - because there were no expectations.
quotes.name: Eli Khamarov

quotes.message: The expectations of life depend upon diligence; the mechanic that would perfect his work must first sharpen his tools.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality.
quotes.name: Ralph Marston

quotes.message: When we put down ideas of what life should be like, we are free to wholeheartedly say yes to our life as it is.
quotes.name: Tara Brach

quotes.message: Do what you can with what you have where you are.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: The problem is not that there are problems. The problem is expecting otherwise and thinking that having problems is a problem.
quotes.name: Theodore Rubin

quotes.message: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves.
quotes.name: Thomas Alva Edison

quotes.message: Where there is love there are no demands, no expectations, no dependency. I do not demand that you make me happy; my happiness does not lie in you.
quotes.name: Anthony De Mello

quotes.message: Creating perfection will also create expectations for the future
quotes.name: Rick Helders

quotes.message: Expect much from yourself and little from others and you will avoid incurring resentments.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: The universe constantly and obediently answers to our conceptions; whether we travel fast or slow, the track is laid for us.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: I did what I came here to do. What I've done I've done with sincerity and to the best of my ability. You can't expect much more from life.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Expect to have hope rekindled. Expect your prayers to be answered in wondrous ways. The dry seasons in life do not last. The spring rains will come again.
quotes.name: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.message: Do everything with a mind that lets go. Do not expect praise or reward.
quotes.name: Achaan Chah

quotes.message: You have to take risks.We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return. To just give. That takes courage, because we don't want to fall on our faces or leave ourselves open to hurt.
quotes.name: Madonna

quotes.message: Every human being is entitled to courtesy and consideration. Constructive criticism is not only to be expected but sought.
quotes.name: Margaret Chase Smith

quotes.message: If you align expectations with reality, you will never be disappointed.
quotes.name: Terrell Owens

quotes.message: You can't base your life on other people's expectations.
quotes.name: Stevie Wonder

quotes.message: Whatever happens in the world is real, what one thinks should have happened is projection. We suffer more from our fictitious illusion and expectations of reality.
quotes.name: Jacque Fresco

quotes.message: We don't want people to have expectations of us, but then we have expectations of everybody else.
quotes.name: Lauryn Hill

quotes.message: There's a victory in letting go of your expectations.
quotes.name: Mike White

quotes.message: Our expectations are our standards imposed upon someone else.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Expectations manifest when we impose our standards on the people around us. We often do this with good intentions—we genuinely believe that the person should adopt what we believe because it's a better standard compared to theirs.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Expectations almost always carry the concept of 'should' in our minds, which brings with it furious thoughts of unfairness and indignation.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Without expectations, we see someone for who they are— in all their flawed imperfection—without judgment.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: Expectations lead to resentment and resentment always leads to judgment.
quotes.name: Xandria Ooi

quotes.message: A man who lives with expectations is bound to feel frustrated because existence has no obligation to you. But if you live without intentions, without expectations, then miraculously you will find that everything you ever dreamed of is being fulfilled.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: The real thing is that you are suffering from your expectations. When they are not fulfilled-frustration arises, failure arises, and you feel neglected as if existence does not care for you.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: High expectations can lead to great disappointments.
quotes.name: Alfred Henry

quotes.message: Expectations have so long and so often been combated by disappointment that I feel myself unhappy, my spirits which were naturally cheerful are depressed and the enjoyments of life are growing very insipid to me.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: One month of daily expectation is more tedious than a year of certainty.
quotes.name: Abigail Adams

quotes.message: I indicated no wish or purpose of my own;I simply expressed my expectation. Cannot the judge perceive the distinction between a purpose and an expectation? I have often expressed an expectation to die but I have never expressed a wish to die.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Remaining trapped in the world of preferences we are led to an expectation of how things should be. When our expectation of how things should be conflicts with how things are, there is dukkha, suffering.
quotes.name: Mu Soeng

quotes.message: Soldiers! Your country has a right to expect great things from you. Justify her expectations!...All, when they return home, would wish to say proudly, 'I was with the victorious Army of Italy.
quotes.name: Napoleon

quotes.message: In meditation, don't expect anything. Just sit back and see what happens. Treat the whole thing as an experiment. Take an active interest in the test itself, but don't get distracted by your expectations about the results. For that matter, don't be anxious for any result whatsoever.
quotes.name: Bhante Henepola Gunaratana

quotes.message: Your life is colored by your expectations.
quotes.name: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.message: You don't like being rejected, but your expectations were minimum and your patience maximum.
quotes.name: Nancy Hopkins Reily

quotes.message: Victory in a great cause is measured not only by reaching the final goal. It is also a triumph to live up to expectations in your lifetime.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: If our expectations—if our fondest prayers and dreams— are not realized, then we should all bear in mind that the greatest glory of living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time you fall.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: The knowledge that in your day you did your duty, and lived up to the expectations of your fellow men is in itself a rewarding experience and magnificent achievement.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Make the expectations lively enough, and action will follow.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: It was only when you started to insatiably expect; . that every stranger on the street would wholeheartedly smile; . altruistically enshroud each dreary aspect of your beleaguered existence with unprecedented happiness, . That it terribly hurt you; when he unsparingly abused you; . excoriating you apart like inconspicuously frigid shit; . for ostensibly no reason or plausible rhyme; instead.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: If you spent your life concentrating on what everyone else thought of you, would you forget who you really were? What if the face you showed the world turned out to be a mask...
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: Treat a man as he is and he will remain as he is. Treat a man as he can and should be and he will become as he can and should be.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: To wish was to hope, and to hope was to expect.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: What I have since realized is that if people expect you to be brave, sometimes you pretend that you are, even when you are frightened down to your very bones.
quotes.name: Sharon Creech

quotes.message: There were two ways to be happy: improve your reality or lower your expectations.
quotes.name: Jodi Picoult

quotes.message: A wonderful gift may not be wrapped as you expect.
quotes.name: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.message: I hope you do not let anyone else’s expectations direct the course of your life.
quotes.name: Julianne Donaldson

quotes.message: I'd rather be pleasantly surprised than fatally disappointed.
quotes.name: Julia Glass

quotes.message: Expectation wasn't just about what people expected of you. It was about what you expected of yourself.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson
